description.p: You gain the ability to use the discordant notes you have learned to disrupt another spellcaster. As a reaction you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration to counter a spell being cast. Roll your Bardic Inspiration die + 8 against a DC of 10 plus the level of the spell being cast.

description.p: By singing the counter melody you learned while studying the box you can briefly suppress any magical effects in an area. For 1 minute all permanent magical effects in a 10 ft area around you are suppressed. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier per long rest.

description.p: Once per turn, when you cast a spell that deals fire damage you can grant temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier to a friendly creature within 10 feet of you or your wildfire spirit. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

p.i: 3rd-level Circle of the Leaf druid feature

description.p: You gain an additional way to cast the Plant Growth spell. When you cast the spell over 1 minute you revitalize the surrounding ecosystem. All normal plants in a 100-foot radius centered on you are immediately cured of disease, and dead or withered plants spring back to life with new growth. Trees bud with fresh leaves, blossoms unfurl, and fruit begins to ripen early. The area becomes a verdant sanctuary, filled with gentle life energy.
As part of this casting, you may choose one of the following effects, which lasts for 1 hour within the area:

ul.li: Balm of the Blooming Bough: All healing spells you cast within the area restore additional hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

Thornhide Sanctuary: You may choose up to a number of creatures equal to your proficiency bonus within the area. Each gains a +2 bonus to AC as their skin is lightly reinforced with barklike patterns or floral shielding.

Verdant Ward: Choose one elemental damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder). All living creatures within the area gain resistance to that damage type, protected by the latent energy of awakened flora responding to your presence.

sheet.description: You gain an additional way to cast the Plant Growth spell. When you cast the spell over 1 minute you revitalize the surrounding ecosystem in a 100-foot radius.
